title: T206 Trade ++ Sov.350 Turner ==> Pattee / Hindu SL

posts.post_title: T206 Trade ++ Sov.350 Turner ==> Pattee / Hindu SL
posts.post_content:
I have this tough combo PSA 2(mk) Sov. 350 Turner.... :)

I would love to trade it for a Sov.150 or Hindu Pattee, in any condition .... ;)

I would also consider trading it for any Hindu Southern Lg. that I do not have (especially Lipe).

I could add $$$$ if needed.

If you are a "cracker" I would think the pencil on back could be easily erased.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=303357&d=1516822152[/IMG]


[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott :rolleyes:
